ngValidation 概述

A high-performance and high-availability form validation component based on AngularJS.

ngValidation是一个高性能、高可用、易于扩展的 AngularJS 表单验证组件。

Getting Started with ngValidation

安装

bower install ng-validation --save

使用

<script src="bower_components/ng-validation/angular-validation.js"></script>
angular.module('yourApp', ['ngValidation']);
